nodes.text: The Flower Market was a market in Shelkonwa's capital Makrin City. The tables owned sound absorbers to make private haggling possible. In 0 ABY, the Rebels Chivkyrie, Slanni, Vokkoli and Organa met Chief Administrator Vilim Disra in this place. The goal of this meeting was to find out how Governor Barshnis Choard intended to make the Shelsha sector independent. However, Disra left the meeting after Organa had asked him about the number of allies, because he wanted to betray the Rebel members.
